links: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: f[n_] := Total[(n/Select[Divisors@ n, Mod[#, 4] == 3 &])^3]; Array[f, 64] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 26 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, ((n/d % 4)== 3)* d^3); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 26 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 23 1999
extensions: Offset changed from 0 to 1 by _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 27 2015
